text.tspan: Prevalence of HIV: Share of young males and females infected with
In countries that are shown below the grey line the share of women with HIV infections is relatively higher.
Share of women with HIV (% ages 15-24)
Share of men with HIV (% ages 15-24)
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
